languages.text: The Undying Emperor uses the {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Colossal Cleave{/g} or {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Death Whispered Your Name{/g} ability, targeting the closest enemy. If there are multiple possible targets, out of these, he will target the one with the lowest percentage of wounds. If there are still multiple possible targets, one will be selected randomly among them.

traits.locale_text:
The creature targets close enemies with less Wounds. Available abilities:
-<indent=5%>{g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Colossal Cleave{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Death-Seeker{/g}</indent>

The Undying Emperor uses the {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Colossal Cleave{/g} or {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Death Whispered You Name{/g} ability against enemies at close range with the smallest number of wounds.

The Undying Emperor uses the {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Colossal Cleave{/g} or {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Death Whispered You Name{/g} ability against enemies at close range with the smallest number of wounds.

The Undying Emperor uses the {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Colossal Cleave{/g} or {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Death Whispered You Name{/g} ability, targeting the closest enemy. If there are multiple possible targets, out of these, he will target the one with the lowest percentage of wounds. If there are still multiple possible targets, one will be selected randomly among them.

The Undying Emperor uses the {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Colossal Cleave{/g} or {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Death Whispered You Name{/g} ability, targeting the closest enemy. If there are multiple possible targets, out of these, he will target the one with the lowest percentage of wounds. If there are still multiple possible targets, one will be selected randomly among them.

languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава IV. Локация DeathCultTemple.
Красня фаза (Кровь).
Бафф-маркер для Игрока (и технических особенностей энкаунтера), который говорит, что Смерть-Император вошел в фазу Крови и готовится применить одну из двух абилок: Colossal Cleave или Death-Seeker. После этой фазы наступает фаза Разума.

languages.text: Неумирающий Император применяет способность {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Исполинский раскол{/g} или {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Смерть прошептала твое имя{/g}, выбирая в качестве цели ближайшего врага. Если подходящих врагов несколько, целью становится тот, у кого осталось меньше процентов здоровья от максимального. Если таких целей несколько, выбирается случайная из них.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor uses the {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Colossal Cleave{/g} or {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Death Whispered Your Name{/g} ability, targeting the closest enemy. If there are multiple possible targets, out of these, he will target the one with the lowest percentage of wounds. If there are still multiple possible targets, one will be selected randomly among them.

traits.locale_text: Неумирающий Император применяет способность {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Исполинский раскол{/g} или {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Смерть прошептала твое имя{/g}, выбирая в качестве цели ближайшего врага. Если подходящих врагов несколько, целью становится тот, у кого осталось меньше процентов здоровья от максимального. Если таких целей несколько, выбирается случайная из них.

Неумирающий Император применяет способность {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Исполинский раскол{/g} или {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Смерть прошептала твое имя{/g}, выбирая в качестве цели ближайшего врага. Если подходящих врагов несколько, целью становится тот, у кого осталось меньше процентов здоровья от максимального. Если таких целей несколько, выбирается случайная из них.

languages.text: El Emperador Inmortal utiliza la capacidad {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Cuchillada colosal{/g} o {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}La muerte susurra tu nombre{/g} contra el enemigo más cercano. Si hay varios objetivos posibles, de entre todos ellos seleccionará al que conserve un porcentaje menor de sus heridas. Si aún sigue habiendo múltiples objetivos, se elegirá uno al azar.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor uses the {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Colossal Cleave{/g} or {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Death Whispered Your Name{/g} ability, targeting the closest enemy. If there are multiple possible targets, out of these, he will target the one with the lowest percentage of wounds. If there are still multiple possible targets, one will be selected randomly among them.

traits.locale_text: El Emperador Inmortal utiliza la capacidad {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Cuchillada colosal{/g} o {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}La muerte susurra tu nombre{/g} contra el enemigo más cercano. Si hay varios objetivos posibles, de entre todos ellos seleccionará al que conserve un porcentaje menor de sus heridas. Si aún sigue habiendo múltiples objetivos, se elegirá uno al azar.

languages.text: 不死の皇帝は{g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}巨大な薙刀{/g}または{g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}死が名前を囁いた{/g}の能力を使用し、最も近く敵をターゲットとする。対象となりうる敵が複数いる場合、その中で最も傷の割合が低い敵を対象とする。まだ複数の対象がいる場合、その中からランダムに1体を選ぶ。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor uses the {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Colossal Cleave{/g} or {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Death Whispered Your Name{/g} ability, targeting the closest enemy. If there are multiple possible targets, out of these, he will target the one with the lowest percentage of wounds. If there are still multiple possible targets, one will be selected randomly among them.

traits.locale_text: 不死の皇帝は{g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}巨大な薙刀{/g}または{g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}死が名前を囁いた{/g}の能力を使用し、最も近く敵をターゲットとする。対象となりうる敵が複数いる場合、その中で最も傷の割合が低い敵を対象とする。まだ複数の対象がいる場合、その中からランダムに1体を選ぶ。

languages.text: 不死神皇使用{g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}巨神斩击{/g}或{g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}死亡低语你的名字{/g}能力，攻击离他最近的敌人。如果多名目标距离相同，则不死神皇会攻击生命值百分比最低的目标。如果多名目标生命值百分比相同，则不死神皇会随机选择其中一位。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor uses the {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Colossal Cleave{/g} or {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Death Whispered Your Name{/g} ability, targeting the closest enemy. If there are multiple possible targets, out of these, he will target the one with the lowest percentage of wounds. If there are still multiple possible targets, one will be selected randomly among them.

traits.locale_text: 不死神皇使用{g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}巨神斩击{/g}或{g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}死亡低语你的名字{/g}能力，攻击离他最近的敌人。如果多名目标距离相同，则不死神皇会攻击生命值百分比最低的目标。如果多名目标生命值百分比相同，则不死神皇会随机选择其中一位。

languages.text: Der Todlose Imperator setzt die Fähigkeit {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Heftiges Hackmesser{/g} oder {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Der Tod hat deinen Namen geflüstert{/g} gegen den nächstgelegenen Gegner ein. Gibt es mehrere mögliche Ziele, visiert er das Ziel mit dem niedrigsten Prozentsatz an Wunden an. Gibt es hierbei immer noch mehrere Ziele, wird ein Ziel zufällig ausgewählt.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor uses the {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Colossal Cleave{/g} or {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Death Whispered Your Name{/g} ability, targeting the closest enemy. If there are multiple possible targets, out of these, he will target the one with the lowest percentage of wounds. If there are still multiple possible targets, one will be selected randomly among them.

traits.locale_text: Der Todlose Imperator setzt die Fähigkeit {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Heftiges Hackmesser{/g} oder {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Der Tod hat deinen Namen geflüstert{/g} gegen den nächstgelegenen Gegner ein. Gibt es mehrere mögliche Ziele, visiert er das Ziel mit dem niedrigsten Prozentsatz an Wunden an. Gibt es hierbei immer noch mehrere Ziele, wird ein Ziel zufällig ausgewählt.

languages.text: L'Empereur Immortel utilise la capacité {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Taillade colossale{/g} ou {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}La mort a murmuré votre nom{/g} sur l'ennemi le plus proche. Si plusieurs ennemis se trouvent à distance égale, il ciblera celui dont le pourcentage de blessures est le plus faible. S'il reste malgré tout plusieurs cibles possibles, il en sélectionnera une aléatoirement.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor uses the {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Colossal Cleave{/g} or {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Death Whispered Your Name{/g} ability, targeting the closest enemy. If there are multiple possible targets, out of these, he will target the one with the lowest percentage of wounds. If there are still multiple possible targets, one will be selected randomly among them.

traits.locale_text: L'Empereur Immortel utilise la capacité {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Taillade colossale{/g} ou {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}La mort a murmuré votre nom{/g} sur l'ennemi le plus proche. Si plusieurs ennemis se trouvent à distance égale, il ciblera celui dont le pourcentage de blessures est le plus faible. S'il reste malgré tout plusieurs cibles possibles, il en sélectionnera une aléatoirement.

L'Empereur Immortel utilise la capacité {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Taillade colossale{/g} ou {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}La mort a murmuré votre nom{/g} sur l'ennemi le plus proche. Si plusieurs ennemis se trouvent à distance égale, il ciblera celui dont le pourcentage de blessures est le plus faible. S'il reste malgré tout plusieurs cibles possibles, il en sélectionnera une aléatoirement.

languages.text: Ölmeyen İmparator, {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Devasa Yarma{/g} veya {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Ölüm Adını Fısıldıyor{/g} kabiliyetini kullanarak en yakındaki düşmanı hedef alır. Birden fazla olası hedef varsa bunlardan en düşük sağlık yüzdesine sahip olanı hedef alır. Hâlâ birden fazla olası hedef bulunuyorsa içlerinden biri rastgele seçilir.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor uses the {g|f:f86ec5197f324351a2f62468a05a5a4b}Colossal Cleave{/g} or {g|f:c449c4181a484879913d0c31c8618ed8}Death Whispered Your Name{/g} ability, targeting the closest enemy. If there are multiple possible targets, out of these, he will target the one with the lowest percentage of wounds. If there are still multiple possible targets, one will be selected randomly among them.
